src_text: Xiyimo xa Khabinete eka Timhakakulu1.
trg_text: ISSUES IN THE ENVIRONMENT1.

src_text: Levhele ya Vulemukisi leyi Fambelanisiweke ya Mune ya mpfalelo wa rixaka
trg_text: Adjusted Alert Level 4 of the national lockdown

src_text: Khabinete hi tiyisise ku cinceriwa eka Levhele ya Vulemukisi leyi Fambelanisiweke ya Mune tanihilaha yi tivisiweke hakona hi Muchaviseki Phuresidente Cyril Ramaphosa hi Sonto, 27 Khotavuxika 2021 tanihi goza leri faneleke eka nyimpi ehenhla ka gandlati ra vunharhu ra ntungukulu wa COVID-19 eAfrika-Dzong
trg_text: Cabinet reaffirmed the move to Adjusted Alert Level 4 as announced by His Excellency President Cyril Ramaphosa on Sunday, 27 June 2021 as a necessary step in the fight against the third wave of the COVID-19 pandemic in South Afric

src_text: Ku tiyisiwa ka swipimelo swi ta tiyisa vuswikoti bya hina eka ku hunguta ntlakuko eka mitluletavuvabyi hikwalaho ka sweswo ku hungutiwa ndzhwalo ehenhla ka sisiteme ya nhlayiso wa swa rihanyo leyi se yi taleriweke kutlula mpim
trg_text: The tightening of the restrictions will strengthen our ability to limit the surge in infections thereby limiting the burden on the health care system that is already overwhelme

src_text: Swipimelo swo engetela swi ta kambisisiwa endzhaku ka 14 wa masiku naswona swi tekerile enhlokweni ku hunguta nkhumbo eka nghingiriko wa ikhonomi tanihi xiphemu xa ku ringanerisa loku yaka emahlweni ka xidingo xa ku ponisa havumbirhi bya vutomi na vutihanyis
trg_text: The additional restrictions will be reviewed after 14 days and took care to minimise the impact in economic activity as part of the continued balancing of the need to save both lives and livelihood

src_text: Khabinete yi tshikelele hi vuntshwa leswaku muxaka wa Delta wu tluleteka hi ku olova kutlula mixaka ya nkarhi lowu nga hundza, naswona hikokwalaho wu lava ku tshama hi vambile ngoma eka min'wangulano ya hina ya siku na siku hikuva vanhu vo tala lava va tluleriweke hi COVID-19 a va kombi swikombeto swihi kumbe swih
trg_text: Cabinet re-emphasized that the Delta variant is more transmissible than previous variants, and therefore requires vigilance in our day- to-day interactions because many people who are infected with COVID-19 do not show any symptom

src_text: Swiletelo swa Vuhlayiseki bya Rihanyo ra le Ntirhweni leswi Katsakanyiweke hi Holobye wa Mitirho na Vatirhi swi nyika swiletelo leswi swi ringanerisaka xidingo xa ku endla mabindzu ya tshama ya ri eku tirheni loko hi le tlhelo ku ri karhi ku tiyisisiwa rihanyo na vuhlayiseki munhu un'wana na un'wana entirhwen
trg_text: The Consolidated Occupational Health Safety Directions by the Minister of Employment and Labour provides guidelines which balance the need to keep businesses running while also ensuring the health and safety of everyone in the workplac

src_text: Hi nkarhi lowu wa khombo, swa tsundzuxiwa na ku va swa nkoka swonghasi ku ponisa vutomi hi ku papalata tindhawu ta mani na mani swinene hilaha swi kotekaka hakona, hi ku landzelela Swinawana swa Malawulelo ya Timhangu swa COVID-19 na ku landzelela milawu ya rihanyo leyi nga riki ya mirhi ya ku ambala swipfalaxikandza loko hi ri evanhwini, ku hlamba swandla swa hina nkarhi na nkarhi hi xisibi na mati kumbe ku tirhisa sanithayizara ya swandla leyi nga na xihoko xa 70%, ku hlayisa ku siyiwa ka pfhuka exikarhi ka vanhu wa mpimohansi wa 1,5 wa timitara hi mikarhi hinkway
trg_text: During this dangerous period, it is advisable and critical to save lives by avoiding public places as far as possible, abiding by the Covid-19 Disaster Management Regulations and adhering to non- pharmaceutical health protocols of wearing masks when in public, washing our hands frequently with soap and water or using a 70% alcohol-based hand sanitiser, maintaining a social distance of at least 1,5 metres at all times

src_text: Hangalaso wa swisawutisi swa COVID-19
trg_text: COVID-19 vaccine roll-out

src_text: Afrika-Dzonga yi ya emahlweni yi tiyisa Nongonoko wa Hangalaso wa Nsawutiso wa COVID-19 ku sirhelela vaakatiko eka switandzhaku swo onhetela swa xitsongwatsongwana lex
trg_text: South Africa continues to intensify the COVID-19 Vaccination Roll-out Programme to protect citizens from the devastating effects of the viru As of the 30 June 2021, over 3 million (3, 026, 636) people have been vaccinated and these include health care workers, persons aged 60 and older, and educator This 238 315 educators that have been vaccinate

src_text: Tanihilaha a swi ri xiswona hi 30 Khotavuxika 2021, kutlula timiliyoni tinharhu (3, 026, 636) ta vanhu ti sawutisiwile naswona leswi swi katsa vatirhi va nhlayiso wa swa rihanyo, vanhu lava nga na 60 wa malembe hi vukhale na kutlula, na vadyondzis Eka lava 238 315 i vadyondzisi lava va sawutisiwek
trg_text: The vaccination of security personnel will commence on Monday, 5 July 2021 with members of the SAPS and Thursday, 8 July 2021 with members of the South African National Defence Forc

src_text: Khabinete yi hoyozele tindzawulo ta Rihanyo na Dyondzo ya Masungulo eka ku angula hi ndlela leyi faneleke eka swidingo swa vadyondzisi na vatirhi van'wana lava nga eka tisekitara ta dyondzo ta mfumo na leti nga riki ta mfumo hi ku endla nongonoko wa nsawutiso wo katsakany
trg_text: Cabinet commended the departments of Health and Basic Education for responding accordingly to the needs of educators and other personnel within the public and private education sectors by undertaking a comprehensive vaccination programm

src_text: Nsawutiso wa varindzi wu ta sungula hi Musumbhunuku, 5 Mawuwani 2021 hi swirho swa SAPS, kasi hi Ravumune, 8 Mawuwani 2021 hi swirho swa Vuthu ra Vusirheleri ra Rixaka ra Afrika-Dzong
trg_text: The 2021 tax filing season will open on Thursday, 1 July 2021 until Tuesday, 23 November 2021.

src_text: Ntsariso wa nsawutiso eka EVDS wu pfuriwile ku tsarisela vanhu lava nga na 50 wa malembe na kutlula hi vukhale, naswona nsawutiso wa vona wu xeduriwile ku sungula hi Ravumune, 15 Mawuwani 2021.
trg_text: The registration for vaccination on the EVDS has been opened for registration for persons aged 50 years and older, and their vaccination is scheduled to commence on Thursday, 15 July 2021.

src_text: Vanhu lava nga eka ntlawa lowu wa malembe hi vukhale va khutaziwa ku tsarisa hi ku tirhisa https://vaccinenrolhealtgoza kumbe WhatsApp: 0600 123456.
trg_text: People in this age group are encouraged to register using the https://vaccinenrolhealtgoza or WhatsApp: 0600 123455.

src_text: Masiku ya nsawutiso wa vatirhi lava tirhanaka na vanhu hi ku kongoma eka tisekitara ta ikhonomi ta vuhumesi to tanihi migodi, mavhengele na tin'wana ma ta tivisiwa hi IMC eka Swisawutisi leyi mutshamaxitulu wa yona ku nga Xandla xa Phuresidente
trg_text: The dates for vaccination of employees in the frontline of productive economic sectors such as mines, retail workers and others will be announced by the IMC on Vaccines that is chaired by the Deputy President

src_text: Siku ra Vantshwa
trg_text: Youth Day

src_text: Khabinete yi khense vanhu va Afrika-Dzonga hinkwavo eka ku tikatsa eka mitlangelo ya Siku ra Vantshwa ya tiko hi Ravunharhu, 16 Khotavuxika 2021 ehansi ka nkongomelo:
trg_text: Cabinet thanked all South Africans for joining in the country s Youth Day celebrations on Wednesday, 16 June 2021 under the theme:

src_text: Lembe ra Charlotte Mannya Maxeke: Ku kurisa mitirho ya vantshwa ya rixaka leri katsaka hinkwavo na ku va leri cincek
trg_text: The Year of Charlotte Mannya Maxeke: Growing youth employment for an inclusive and transformed societ

src_text: Phuresidente Ramaphosa u pfule tipulatifomo ta ku dyondza ta le ka inthanete na ta swivandla swa mitirho swa le ka inthanete, SA Youth na mPowa, leti ti lavaka ku tumbuluxa swivandlanene swa ku nyika timali na mitirho eka vantshwa hi ku va hlanganisa na vathori na vanyikatimali lava nga tshukaka va va kon Vantshwa va nga tumbuluxa phurofayili, va vona swivandlanene swa ku dyondza na swa ku nghenisa mali, na ku kuma nseketelo hi ku tirhisa tichanelenyingi leti nga eka tipulatifomo let
trg_text: President Ramaphosa unveiled the online learning and jobs opportunities platforms, SA Youth and mPowa, which seek to create funding opportunities and jobs for young people by connecting them with potential employers and funder Youth can create a profile, view opportunities for learning and earning, and receive support through multiple channels on the platform

src_text: Endzela http://SAYoutmobi kumbe u dayila nomboro ya riqingho ra mahala: 0800 72 72 72 ku fikelela swivandlanene swo hambanahambana na ku seketela hi ku tirhisa Mphalalo wa Mitirho ya Vantshwa wa Phuresident
trg_text: Visit http://SAYoutmobi or dial the toll-free: 0800 72 72 72 to access a range of opportunities and support through the Presidential Youth Employment Interventio

src_text: Swiboho swa Khabinete1.
trg_text: CABINET DECISIONS1.

src_text: Xiviko hi mayelana na Mfumo wa Miganga
trg_text: Report on Local Government

src_text: Khabinete yi kanele xiyimo xa mfumo wa miganga hi ku leteriwa hi swiviko kusuka eka Ndzawulo ya Mfumontirhisano na Timhaka ta Ndhavuko (CoGTA), Vutamelankwama bya Rixaka na Oditara-Jenerala wa Afrika-Dzong
trg_text: Cabinet discussed the state of local government informed by the reports from the Department of Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs (CoGTA), National Treasury and Auditor-General South Afric

src_text: Khabinete yi lemuke leswaku xiyimo xo tsana xa timasipala tin'wana na leswaku eka swiyimo swin'wana, mfumo wa rixaka wu ta boheka ku phalala hi ndlela ya ku teka swiboho hi ku hatlisa ku antswisa mphakelo wa vukorhokeri na vuswikoti bya timasipala to karhi hi ku fambisana na milulamiselo ya Xiyenge xa 139(7) xa Vumbiwa ra Rhiphabuliki ya Afrika-Dzonga ra 1996.
trg_text: Cabinet noted the dire state of some municipalities and that in some instances, national government will have to intervene decisively to improve service delivery and the capacity of specific municipalities in line with the provisions of Section 139(7) of the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of 1993.

src_text: Hi ku engetela, mfumo wa rixaka lowu rhangeriweke hi CoGTA, Vutamelankwama bya Rixaka na tindzawulo ta mphakelo wa vukorhokeri wu ta tiyisa nseketelo wa wona eka timasipala hi ku fambisana na Modlolo wa Nhluvukiso lowu Simekiweke eka Swifundzatsongo (DDM) na vutihlamuleri bya tona tanihilaha byi lulamiseriweke hakona eka Xiyenge xa 154 xa Vumbiwa
trg_text: In addition, national government led by CoGTA, National Treasury and service-delivery departments will strengthen their support to municipalities in line with the District-based Development Model (DDM) and their responsibilities as provided for in Section 154 of the Constitution

src_text: Mphalalo wa Muganga wa Nhluvukiso wa le Dzongeni wa Afrika (SADC) eMozambique
trg_text: Southern African Development Community (SADC) intervention in Mozambique

src_text: Khabinete yi amukele swiboho swa Samiti yo ka yi nga Tolovelekangi ya Varhangeri va Tiko na Mfumo va SADC leyi khomiweke eMaputo, Mozambique hi Ravunharhu, 23 Khotavuxika 2022.
trg_text: the Extraordinary Summit of the Heads of State and Government of the SADC held in Maputo, Mozambique on Wednesday, 23 June 2022.

src_text: Samiti leyi yi pasise vutekaxiave bya matiko lama nga swirho eka mphalalo wa ku tshamisekisa xiyimo eMozambiqu Tanihi xiphemu xa SADC, Afrika-Dzonga yi ta tlhela yi teka xiave eka mapfhumba lama endleriweke ku vuyisa ntshamiseko eka xifundza lexi
trg_text: The summit approved the participation of the member countries in the intervention to stabilise the situation in Mozambiqu As part of the SADC, South Africa will also participate in these initiatives meant to restore stability in the region

src_text: Ku rhurheriwa ka
trg_text: Tax Season

src_text: Khomferense ya matiko ya misava ya vu21 hi mayelana na Mitluletavuvabyi ya AIDS na Mavabyi ya Tingana (tiSTI) eAfrika (ICASA)
trg_text: Hosting of the 21st International Conference on AIDS and Sexually Transmitted Infections (STIs) in Africa (ICASA)

src_text: Khabinete yi pasise leswaku Afrika-Dzonga yi rhurhela ICASA ya vu21, leyi yi nga ta khomeriwa eDurban kusuka hi siku ra 6 kufika 11 N'wendzamhala 2021.
trg_text: Cabinet approved for South Africa to host the 21st ICASA, which will be held in Durban from 6 to 11 December 2022.

src_text: Ku rhurheriwa ka ICASA swi ta nyika Afrika-Dzonga xivandlanene xa ku kombisa vutiboheleri bya yona ku angula eka mipakaniso ya vutshunguri ya 90-90-90 ya Vun'we bya Tinxaka ku pfuna ku herisa ntungu wa AID Afrika-Dzonga yi khatsile ndzima yo tivikana eka nyimpi ehenhla eka HIV an AIDS, kambe swo tala swa ha dinga ku endliwa ku hunguta nhlayo ya mitluletavuvabyi yintshw
trg_text: 90-90-90 treatment targets to help end the AIDS epidemi South Africa has made remarkable progress in the fight against HIV and AIDS, but more still needs to be done to reduce the number of new infection

src_text: Khomferense leyi yi ta tlhela yi nyika pulatifomo ya mikanelo na swivandlanene swa ku dyondza hi mayelana na maqhinga ya nsivelo wa HIV na tiSTI eka mbangu wa ntungukulu wa COVID-19.
trg_text: The conference will further provide a platform for discussions and learning opportunities regarding HIV and STIs prevention strategies in the context of the COVID-19 pandemic

src_text: Michavelelo eka vanhu va Zambia
trg_text: Condolences to the people of Zambia

src_text: Khabinete yi hundzise michavelelo ya yona eka ndyangu na vanhu va Zambia eka ku hundza emisaveni ka Phuresidente ya masungulo wa Rhiphabuliki ya Zambia, Dkd Kenneth
trg_text: Cabinet extended its condolences to the family and Zambian people on the passing on of the founding President of the Republic of Zambia, Dr Kenneth

src_text: Kaunda (97), hi Ravumune, 17 Khotavuxika 2021.
trg_text: Kaunda (97), on Thursday, 17 June 2021.

src_text: Dkd Kaunda a ri un'wana wa vaseketeri vo rhangela wa Vuendli bya swa Afrika byo Angarhela, tlhelo nghwazi yo sungulasungula ya Afrika leyi susiweke xikoloni, leyi nga na vun'we na ku humelel
trg_text: Dr Kaunda was one of the leading advocates of Pan-Africanism, and a pioneering champion of a decolonised, united and prosperous Afric

src_text: Hi ku xixima yena, Phuresidente Ramaphosa u tivise 10 ra masiku ra ku zila kusuka hi Ravuntlhanu, 18 Khotavuxika 2021 kufikela nimadyambu hi Sonto, 27 Khotavuxika 2021, leswi swi khumbeke ku ehlisiwanyana ka mijeko eka switichi swa mijeko hinkwaswo .
trg_text: In his honour, President Ramaphosa declared 10 days of mourning from Friday, 18 June 2021 until the evening on Sunday, 27 June 2021, which involved flying flags at half-mast at all flag station

src_text: Evuton'wini hinkwabyo, Dkd Kaunda u tirhe a nga karhali ku kuma nhluvuko wa ikhonomi, wa vanhu na wa tipolitiki eAfrika, naswona a ri xihontlovila xa Nyimpi ya Afrika leyi tshunxekeke eka mfumo wa xikoloni na wa xihlawuhlaw U rhangele endlelo ra swa vumunhu ra Afrika, naswona u ta tsundzukiwa hi ku rhandzeka eka vurhangeri bya yena bya kahle swinene eku vumbiweni ka Nhlangano lowu Tiyimelaka na khale ka Nhlangano wa Vun'we bya Afrika (sweswi wu vitaniwaka Yuniyoni ya Afrika).
trg_text: Throughout his life, Dr Kaunda worked tirelessly for economic, social and political progress in Africa, and was a giant of the Struggle for an Africa free from colonial and apartheid rul He championed African humanism, and will be fondly remembered for his outstanding leadership in the formation of the Non-Aligned Movement and the then Organisation of African Unity (now called African Union).

src_text: Khabinete yi amukele nongonoko lowu rhangeriweke hi Ndzawulo ya Mitlangu, Vutshila na Mfumo ku xixima vutomi na vuhoxaxandla bya Dkd Kaunda eka ntshunxeko wa tiko ra ka vona n'wini na tikokulu, ngopfungopfu xifundza xa le Dzongeni wa Afrik Phuresidente Ramaphosa u ta ya enkosini lowu nga ta khomeriwa eLusaka hi Ravunharhu, 2 Mawuwani 2021.
trg_text: Cabinet endorsed a programme led by the Department of Sport, Arts and Culture to pay tribute to the life and contribution of Dr Kaunda to the liberation of his own country and the continent, particularly the Southern African regio President Ramaphosa will attend the funeral to be held in Lusaka on Friday, 2 July 2021.

src_text: Milawumbisi 1.
trg_text: MESSAGES1.

src_text: Nawumbisi wa Hundzuluxo wa Ntsariso wa Mapapila ya Vun'wini
trg_text: Deeds Registration Amendment Bill

src_text: Khabinete yi pasise nkandziyiso wa Nawumbisi wa Hundzuluxo wa Ntsariso wa Mapapila ya Vun'wini leswaku vaaki va nyika mavonel Nawumbisi lowu wu hundzuluxa Nawu wa Mitsariso ya Mapapila ya Vun'wini, 1937 (Nawu wa 47 wa 1937), lowu wu hundzeriweke eka tiphurosese ta won
trg_text: Cabinet approved the publication of the Deeds Registries Amendment Bill for public commen The Bill amends the Deeds Registries Act, 1937 (Act 47 of 1937), which has become outdated in its processe

src_text: Ematshan'weni ya ku tlhantlha maendlelo yo tirha ya Hofisi ya Mitsariso ya Mapapila ya Vun'wini, Nawumbisi lowu wu tlhela wu sungula ku tirhisiwa ka sisiteme ya xielekitironiki ya ku phurosesa swikombelo, leyi yi nga ta endla phurosese leyi yi va ya ximanguvalawa ya ku korhokela tikhonivheyensara na vaaki hi ku angarhel Wu tlhela wu ringanyeta ku thoriwa ka Mutsarisi ya Mapapila ya Vun'wini, Xandla xa Mutsarisi wa Mapapila ya Vun'wini na Mupfuni wa Mutsarisi wa Mapapila ya Vun'win
trg_text: Apart from overhauling the operational procedures of Deeds Registries Office, the Bill also introduces the electronic system of processing submissions, which will modernise the process of serving the conveyancers and the public in genera It also proposes the appointment of the Registrar of Deeds, Deputy Registrar of Deeds and Assistant Registrar of Deeds

src_text: Nawumbisimpfapfarhutwa wa Nhlangano wa Vuhaxi wa Afrika-Dzonga (SABC) wa 2020
trg_text: Draft South African Broadcasting Corporation (SABC) Bill of 2020

src_text: Khabinete yi pasise nkandziyiso wa Nawumbisi wa SABC wa 2020 leswaku vaaki va nyika mavonelo na ku kanerisan Xikan'wekan'we loko wu pasisiwile ku va nawu, Nawumbisi lowu wu ta endla leswaku ku herisiwa Nawu wa Vuhaxi wa nkarhi wa sweswi, 1999 (Nawu wa 4 wa 1999).
trg_text: Cabinet approved the publication of the SABC Bill of 2020 for public comment and consultatio Once passed into law, the Bill will result in the repeal of the current Broadcasting Act, 1999 (Act 4 of 1999).

src_text: Wu lava ku tiyisa matirhelo ya kahle ya mitirho ya muhaxi wa vaak
trg_text: It seeks to strengthen the efficiency of the operations of the public broadcaste

src_text: Nawumbisi lowu, exikarhi ka micinco yin'wana, wu ringanyeta ku vumbiwa hi vuntshwa ka Bodo ya SABC, leswi swi nga ta tiyisa mitirho na vutihlamuleri bya yon
trg_text: The Bill proposes, amongst other changes, the streamlining of the Board of the SABC, which will strengthen its responsibilities and accountabilit It also proposes reforms in the SABC s funding model and the TV licensing syste

src_text: Wu tlhela wu ringanyeta mipfuxeto eka modlolo wo nyika timali wa SABC na sisiteme ya ku nyika tilayisense ta T
trg_text: Taxpayers are encouraged to file their tax returns on eFiling (wwsargoza) or the South African Revenue Service Mobi-Ap

src_text: N'hweti ya Nelson Mandela
trg_text: Nelson Mandela Month

src_text: Lembe rin'wana na rin'wana hi siku ra 18 Mawuwani, vanhu va Afrika-Dzonga swin'we na muganga wa misava hinkwayo va xixima khale ka Phuresidente wa hina tlhelo nhenha ya matiko ya misava
trg_text: Every year on 18 July, South Africans together with the global community honour our former President and international icon

src_text: Dkd Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela
trg_text: Dr Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela

src_text: hi ku tlangeriwa ka Siku ra Misava ra Nelson Mandel
trg_text: through the celebration of Nelson Mandela International Da

src_text: Eka mikarhi leyo tika, hi tshembela eka moya wa hina wa nseketelano wa rixaka na ku nga tilaveli swa hina vini tanihilaha swi yimeriweke hakona hi Madiba ku pfunan Hi moya wa Madiba, Khabinete yi khutaze vanhu va Afrika-Dzonga ku tirha hi ku tinyiketela na ku seketela lava va nga emigangeni ya ka hina lava hetiweke matimba hi switandzhaku swa COVID-19.
trg_text: In these trying times, we depend on our spirit of national solidarity and selflessness as epitomised by Madiba to see one another throug In the spirit of Madiba, Cabinet encouraged South Africans to rise to the challenge and support those in our communities shattered by the effects of COVID-19.

src_text: Hi nga angarhela mikhuvanene ya Madiba na ku xixima ndzhaka ya yena hi ku tirhisa swiendlo swa vuhanani na mapfhumba yo seketela lava tshikeleriweke hi swinene nkhumbo wa xitsongwatsongwana lex 2.
trg_text: We can embrace Madiba s values and honour his legacy through humanitarian acts and initiatives supporting those hard-pressed by the impact of the virus

src_text: Nan'waka nhlayo yo tivikana ya vabari hi un'weun'we yi ta tlhela yi tihlahluva ku olovisa phurosese ley Ku rhumeriwa hi nkarhi na ku va ka nkhaqato ka mitlheriso ya xibalo ku endla leswaku vabari va tshama va ri karhi va landzelela milawu na ku pfuna mfumo ku phakela vukorhokeri bya vanhu va Afrika-Dzonga lava va byi dingaka swinen

src_text: Khabinete yi hundzise vuhoyozeri bya yona na ku navelela leswinene eka: Ttn Nicholas Dlamini, muAfrika-Dzonga wa muntima wo sungula ku siyana hi xikanyakanya eTour de FrancKaizer Chiefs FC eka ku va yi kumile xivandla eka Makumu ya Ligi ya Tinghwazi ya CAF yo xiximiwa na ku naveriwa swonghasi lama nga ta khomeriwa eMorocco hi Mugqivela, 17 Mawuwani 2021, na Mudzaberi Pitso eka ku rhangela Ahl Aly FC ya Egipta kuya eka Makumu ya Tinghwazi ta CAF man'w
trg_text: CongratulationsCabinet extended its congratulations and well-wishes to:Mr Nicholas Dlamini, the first black South African to race in the Tour de FrancKaizer Chiefs FC for securing a place in the prestigious CAF Champions League Finals to be held in Morocco on Saturday, 17 July 2021, and Coach Pitso for leading Ahl Aly FC of Egypt to the same CAF Champions FinalMr Lesetja Kganyago, Governor of the South African Reserve Bank (SARB), who was awarded the Central Bank Governor of the Year in the 2021 edition of the African Banker Award Under his leadership, the SARB acted decisively against the impact of COVID-19 on the economDr Ngwako Stephen Sebopetsa, the Principal of Rathaga Primary School in Rakwadu 1 Circuit, Mopani East District, Limpopo, for receiving the Global Principals

src_text: Ttn Lesetja Kganyago, Gavhenara wa Bangikulu ya Afrika-Dzonga (SARB), loyi a tlhomiweke risiva ra Gavhenara ra Bangi ya le Xikarhi wa Lembe eka xivuyeleriwa xa 2021 xa Masagwati Mubangisi wa Afrik Ehansi ka vurhangeri bya yena, SARB yi tekile magoza hi ndlela yo teka swiboho hi ku hatlisa ehenhla nkhumbo wa COVID-19 eka ikhonomDkd Ngwako Stephen Sebopetsa, Nhloko ya Xikolo xa Phurayimari xa le ka Sekete ya Rakwadu ya 1, Xifundzatsongo-Vuxa xa Mopani, Limpopo, eka ku kuma Sagwati ra Tinhloko ta Swikolo ta Misava Hinkwayo eka vuswikoti bya vurhangeri bya kahle swinene, ntirho wo tivikana na vuhoxaxandla eka ndzima ya dyondzSARB, eka ntlangelo wa yona wa malembexidzana lowu wu funghiweke hi Ravunharhu, 30 Khotavuxika 2021.
trg_text: The bank opened its doors on 30 June 1921 and is the oldest central bank in Afric The SARB holds the important constitutional mandate to maintain price stability in the interest of

src_text: Bangi yi pfule timbati ta yona hi siku ra 30 Khotavuxika 1921 naswona i bangi ya le xikarhi ya khale kutlula hinkwato eAfrik SARB yi na xilerisoximfumo xa vumbiwa xa nkoka ku hlayisa ntshamiseko wa nxavo ku vuyerisa ku kula ka ikhonomi loku ringanerisiweke na ku va loku yisekaka emahlwen Bangi yi humesile xingwece ra R5 xo tsundzuka xintshwa hi ku xixima 100 ra malembe ya yona ya vukona
trg_text: a balanced and sustainable economic growt The bank has released a new commemorative R5 coin in honour of its 100 years in existence

src_text: Michavelelo Khabinete yi hundzise michavelelo ya yona eka ndyangu na vanghana va: Dkd Jabu Mabuza (63), a ri n'wamabindzu wa le Afrika-Dzonga wa vuswikoti swinene tlhelo murhangeri wa mabindzu loyi a tirheke tanihi Muofisirinkulu wa Vurhangerinkulu (CEO) wa Tsogo Sun Holdings, Mutshamaxitulu wa Bodo ya Eskom naswona a tlhela a va Phuresidente ya Vun'we bya Mabindzu bya Afrika-Dzong Phurof Mzilikazi Khumalo (89) na nghamu yakwe Mhani Rose Khumalo (88).
trg_text: choral composer and choir directo He helped put together the first Zulu opera, Princess Magogo kaDinuzul Most notably, Prof Khumalo was part of the committee that amalgamated the Nkosi Sikelel

src_text: Phurof Khumalo a ri ximunhuhatwa lexikulukumba eka xivandla xa swa tidyondzo, swa mfuwo na swa vaak A tlhela a tiveka eka ku va mululamsi wa tinsimu ta xintu, qambi ya vuyimbeleri bya tinoto tlhelo mulawuri wa khwayer U pfune ku hlengeleta opera ya Xizulu yo sungula, Princess Magogo kaDinuzul Xo vonaka kutlula hinkwaswo, Phurof Khumalo a ri xiphemu xa komiti leyi katsaniseke xikhongelo xa Hosi Katekisa Afrika na risimu ra rixaka ra nkarhi wa mfumo wa xihlawuhlawu, Die Stem, ku vumba Risimu ra Rixaka ra Afrika-Dzonga endzhaku ka mfumo wa xihlawuhlaw
trg_text: Prof Khumalo was a colossal figure in South Africa s academic, cultural and public landscap He was also known for being a prominent folk-song arranger
